accept.question: Are you sure of the acceptance of the indicated {{ value }}?
accept.success: The application for registration on the Flexibility Platform "{{ id }}" has been accepted
accept.error: An error occurred while accepting the application on the Flexibility Platform

markRead.question: Are you sure you want to mark the Flexibility Platform application as read?
markRead.success: Marked the application on the Flexibility Platform as read
markRead.error: There was an error marking the application on Flexibility Platform as read

preConfirm.question: Are you sure you want to create a registration thread?
preConfirm.success: A registration thread has been created on the Flexibility Platform
preConfirm.error: An error occurred while creating a registration thread on the Flexibility Platform

reject.question: Are you sure of rejection of the indicated {{ value }}?
reject.success: The application for registration on the Flexibility Platform "{{ id }}" has been rejected
reject.error: An error occurred while rejecting the application on the Flexibility Platform

withdraw.question: Are you sure that the application for registration on the Flexibility Platform should be withdrawn?
withdraw.success: The application for registration on the Flexibility Platform "{{ id }}" has been withdrawn by the applicant
withdraw.error: An error occurred while withdrawing the application on the Flexibility Platform

messages.init:
New application for registration on the Flexbility Platform "{{ id }}":
First name: {{ firstName }}, Last name: {{ lastName }}, Company name: {{ companyName }}, E-mail adress: {{ email }}, phone number: {{ phoneNumber }}
messages.READ_BY_ADMIN: The application for registration on the Flexibility Platform was read by {{ createdBy }}
messages.ACCEPTED_BY_ADMIN: The application for registration on the Flexibility Platform has been accepted
messages.REJECTED_BY_ADMIN: The application for registration on the Flexibility Platform has been rejected
messages.WITHDRAWN_BY_USER: The application for registration on the Flexibility Platform has been withdrawn
